snippet: Paul O’Dette and Ronn McFarlane proved a seamless duo in a concert of Italian and English music from the 16th century.
abstract: James R Oestreich reviews Boston Early Music Festival concert For Two Lutes, featuring lutenists Paul O’Dette and Ronn McFarlane, at Morgan Library & Museum's Gilder Lehrman Hall.
lead_paragraph: Paul O’Dette and Ronn McFarlane proved a seamless duo in a concert of Italian and English music from the 16th century.

headline.main: Review: With Two Star Lutenists, Boston Early Music Festival Comes to the Morgan
headline.print_headline: Lyricism Redoubled in a Lively Two-Way Conversation
